DOC.brief_summary: This study compare cataract patient implantation diffractive multifocal IOL additional power +2.75 diopter ( Group 1 ) +3.25 diopter ( Group 2 ) . Evaluations perform 1 3 month follow cataract surgery , include measurement uncorrected distance visual acuity ( UDVA ) , refractive error ( manifest refraction [ MR ] ) , uncorrected near visual acuity ( UNVA ) 33 , 40 , 50 cm . At 3 month , internal aberration contrast sensitivity evaluate subject complete questionnaire outcome satisfaction , visual symptom , spectacle use .
DOC.brief_title: Comparative Study Two Multifocal Intraocular Lens With Different Add Power
DOC.criteria: age > = 18 cataract patient lens opacity classification high grade III patient desire spectacle indepence distance near vision previous ocular surgery trauma presence corneal opacity fundus abnormality glaucoma uveitis amblyopia systemic disease posterior capsule rupture cataract surgery
